title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps playoff action with Reggie Miller. If Steph Curry wins another title, would that put him in the Top 10 all-time. Greg Olsen shares what broadcasting advice he'd give Tom Brady. And Chris Mannix discusses what he thinks Russ Westbrook's future with the Lakers is. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
